title: Supersymmetric Scattering in Two Dimensions
abstract: We briefly review results on two-dimensional supersymmetric quantum field theories that exhibit factorizable particle scattering. Our particular focus is on a series of $N\!=\!1$ supersymmetric theories, for which exact $S$-matrices have been obtained. A Thermodynamic Bethe Ansatz (TBA) analysis for these theories has confirmed the validity of the proposed $S$-matrices and has pointed at an interesting `folding' relation with a series of $N\!=\!2$ supersymmetric theories.
